casebody.data:
State
v.
Larry Ricardo Tart 407P15-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016 Larry Ricardo Tart, for Tart, Larry Ricardo. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of May 2016 by Defendant for Certificate of Appealability:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016."
